member.name: T:JsonRpc.Standard.Client.JsonRpcClientException
member.summary: The base exception class that indicates the general error of JSON RPC client.

member.summary: The exception that indicates the violation of a server/client-side RPC contract.

member.summary: Gets the JSON RPC message that caused this exception.

member.summary: The exception that indicates an error from remote RPC endpoint.

member.name: P:JsonRpc.Standard.Client.JsonRpcRemoteException.Error
member.summary: The JSON RPC Error object that raises the exception.

member.name: P:JsonRpc.Standard.Client.JsonRpcRemoteException.RemoteException
member.summary: Remote CLR exception data, if available.

member.name: T:JsonRpc.Standard.Client.IJsonRpcClientHandler
member.summary: Provides methods for transmitting the client-side JSON RPC messages.
member.remarks: Implementation Notes: Consider inheriting from instead of directly implementing this interface.

member.name: M:JsonRpc.Standard.Client.IJsonRpcClientHandler.SendAsync(JsonRpc.Standard.RequestMessage,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously sends a JSON RPC Request message, and wait for the Response (if the Request is not a Notification).
member.param: The request message to be sent.
A token used to cancel the transmitting request, or to stop waiting for the Response.
member.returns: A task that returns JSON RPC response, or null if the Request is a Notification.
member.remarks: If a JSON RPC Request has already been sent, cancellation via will only make the returned task stop waiting for the response. To actually notifies the RPC server to cancel certain request, both the client and server side should make a contract on how to cancel an ongoing reqeuest, for example, by sending a special "cancellation" notification.
member.exception: An exception has occurred while transmitting the request. Note that a JSON RPC Response with Error will be returned and no exception should be thrown.

member.name: T:JsonRpc.Standard.Client.JsonRpcClientHandler
member.summary: Provides basic infrastructures for implementation.

member.summary: Raises when a JSON RPC message will be sent.

member.summary: Raises when a JSON RPC message will be received.

member.summary: Raises event.

member.summary: Raises event.

member.summary: Used to compose and send JSON RPC requests.

member.summary: Raises when a JSON RPC Request call is to be cancelled.
member.remarks: This event will not raise when a RPC notification has been cancelled.

member.name: M:JsonRpc.Standard.Client.JsonRpcClient.SendNotificationAsync(System.String,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously send a JSON RPC notification message.
member.param: RPC method name.
The parameters of the invocation. Can be null.
A token used to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A task contains the response of the request, or that contains null if the specified request does not need a response.

member.name: M:JsonRpc.Standard.Client.JsonRpcClient.SendRequestAsync(System.String,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously send a JSON RPC request message.
member.param: RPC method name.
The parameters of the invocation. Can be null.
A token used to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A task contains the response of the request, or that contains null if the specified request does not need a response.
member.exception: (Can be .) The operation has been cancelled.

member.name: M:JsonRpc.Standard.Client.JsonRpcClient.SendAsync(JsonRpc.Standard.RequestMessage,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously send a JSON RPC request or notification message.
member.param: The request message to be sent.
A token used to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A task contains the response of the request, or that contains null if the specified request does not need a response.
member.exception: A with the same id has been sent. You need to try with a different id.
(Can be .) The operation has been cancelled.

member.name: P:JsonRpc.Standard.RequestMessage.Id
member.summary: A unique ID given to the request/response session. The request creator is responsible for assigning this value.

member.name: P:JsonRpc.Standard.RequestMessage.Method
member.summary: The method to invoke on the receiver.

member.name: P:JsonRpc.Standard.RequestMessage.Parameters
member.summary: A representing parameters for the method.

member.name: P:JsonRpc.Standard.RequestMessage.IsNotification
member.summary: Determines whether this Request object is a Notification.
member.remarks: A Notification is a Request object without an "id" member. A Request object that is a Notification signifies the Client's lack of interest in the corresponding Response object, and as such no Response object needs to be returned to the client. The Server MUST NOT reply to a Notification, including those that are within a batch request.

member.name: M:JsonRpc.Standard.Server.JsonRpcServiceHostBuilder.Intercept(System.Func{JsonRpc.Standard.Server.RequestContext,System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task},System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Adds a handler to intercept the JSON RPC requests.
member.param: The handler to be added.
member.remarks: If there are multiple calls to this method, the last handler applied will be the fist to receive the request.

member.name: M:JsonRpc.Standard.Server.JsonRpcServiceHostBuilder.Intercept(System.Func{JsonRpc.Standard.Server.RequestHandler,JsonRpc.Standard.Server.RequestHandler})
member.summary: Adds a middleware to intercept the JSON RPC requests.
member.param: The middleware to be added.

remarks.para: If there are multiple calls to this method, the handler generated by the first applied middleware will be the fist to receive the request.
Usually is preferred to this overload.

member.summary: Builds an instance that implements .

member.name: T:JsonRpc.Standard.Server.RequestHandler
member.summary: The handler function that intercepts the client JSON RPC request.
member.param: Current request context.

member.name: T:JsonRpc.Standard.Server.RequestContext
member.summary: Provides the context per JSON RPC request.

member.name: P:JsonRpc.Standard.Server.RequestContext.ServiceHost
member.summary: Gets the service host that initiates this request.

member.name: P:JsonRpc.Standard.Server.RequestContext.ServiceFactory
member.summary: The factory that creates the JSON RPC service instances to handle the requests.

member.name: P:JsonRpc.Standard.Server.RequestContext.Features
member.summary: The features provided with the request.

member.name: P:JsonRpc.Standard.Server.RequestContext.Request
member.summary: Gets the request message.

member.name: P:JsonRpc.Standard.Server.RequestContext.Response
member.summary: The response message to be sent. If this property is not null, it will take precedence to the return value of the invoked CLR method.

member.name: P:JsonRpc.Standard.Server.RequestContext.CancellationToken
member.summary: The used to cancel this request. This token may be checked in the RPC method.
